alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:31AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Worcester, northwestern Middlesex and east central Hampden Counties through 315 AM EDT... At 231 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms over East Brookfield, or 11 miles southwest of Worcester, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Leominster, Fitchburg, Shrewsbury, Gardner, Holden, Webster, Southbridge, Auburn, Oxford, Clinton, Millbury, Charlton, Spencer, Pepperell, Dudley, Leicester, Groton, Winchendon and Lunenburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester
